webcrawler_project.index package¶

Submodules¶

webcrawler_project.index.direct_index module¶

webcrawler_project.index.direct_index.build_direct_index(directory, stopwords_trie, exceptions_trie)¶

webcrawler_project.index.inverted_index module¶

webcrawler_project.index.inverted_index.build_inverted_index(direct_index)¶

Builds an inverted index from a direct index. Args:

direct_index (dict): A dictionary where keys are document IDs and values are dictionaries of terms with their frequencies in that document.

Returns:

dict: An inverted index where keys are terms and values are dictionaries containing postings (document IDs and their frequencies) and IDF (Inverse Document Frequency).

Module contents¶

Alex's webcrawler
